text: The 2001 Samsung Four Nations Tournament () was the third and the final edition of the Four Nations Tournament which was held from 3 to 5 August 2001 in Shanghai, China. The tournament was planned to host by the Chinese Football Association and International Sport and Leisure (ISL). However, after the bankrupt of the ISL, Chinese Football Association took over the whole tournament.国家队赞助商ISL突告破产 国足遭遇釜底抽薪 ==Participants== North Korea, Kuwait, Trinidad and Tobago, Costa Rica, Ukraine, Belarus and Turkmenistan were invited to the tournament.四国赛总奖金9.5万美元 足协邀请白俄罗斯、科威特参赛足协自费组织四国赛 曼联巨星约克有望随队来华四国赛对手新增乌克兰 力争头号球星舍甫琴科随行 On 26 June 2001, the participants were announced.朝鲜、科威特、特立尼达和多巴哥--四国赛对手确定 * (host) * * * ==Venues== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Shanghai |rowspan="4"| |- | align="center"|250px |- |Shanghai Stadium |- |Capacity: 56,842 |} ==Matches== All times are local, CST (UTC+8). ===Bracket=== ===Semi-finals=== ===Third- place playoff=== ===Final=== ==References== Category:Four Nations Tournament (China) Category:2001 in association football Category:Sports competitions in Shanghai Category:2001 in Chinese football Category:August 2001 sports events in Asia Category:International association football competitions hosted by China
